discussion_comments.comment_body:
Yes it has highlighting but I think it's not highlighted correctly.

We could find GitHub's Lingulish configuration here: https://github.com/github/linguist/blob/971e152fabca12e0ad386833eecb7b15e312a09f/lib/linguist/languages.yml#L5568

But for `console`, it's used for [`.sh-session`](https://github.com/github/linguist/blob/971e152fabca12e0ad386833eecb7b15e312a09f/lib/linguist/languages.yml#L5637) files.

BTW, Sindre is prefer to use `sh` for shell commands: https://github.com/sindresorhus/decamelize/pull/33#discussion_r719034261. I guess the `console` usage in AVA is just a mistake.
